                method=GET)
public java.lang.String home(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        This Method invokes Welcome.jsp page for Client to Fetch/fill client data and also set's the Exchange Code when Client's Callback is called

        Model - Model class containing the attributes required for managing the client registration details.
        session - used session for storing client config,authCode and Id token
        Returns:
        String name of the jsp page to return to

      • authenticate

        @RequestMapping(value="/startOAuth",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String authenticate(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                       ClientRegistration clientRegistration,
                                                                                                                                                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
                                                                                                                                                                throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                                                                                                                                                       java.io.IOException
        This Method set's the current session for Client-side and make AuthUrl for start
        Parameters:
        clientRegistration - CLient class containing the attributes required for managing the client registration details.
        session - used session for storing client config.
        Returns:
        String value for authURl after successful inputs given.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - exception for unsupported encoding and authentication thrown.
        java.io.IOException - exception while authenticating.

      • authenticateCallback

        @RequestMapping(value="/startOAuth/_callback")
public java.lang.String authenticateCallback(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                                             org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                                                      throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                                                                             java.io.IOException
        This Method is invoked as callback function for Auth. URL and saves Session for Exchange Code.
        Parameters:
        request - used http request for getting auth code.
        response - used http response for auth code.
        Returns:
        String name of the jsp file used.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - exception for callback thrown.
        java.io.IOException - exception for callback thrown.
